let.value: {loadNewerFromServer: SELECT U.id, U.name username, U.status, CASE U.status WHEN "ONLINE" THEN 1 ELSE 2 END iStatusOrder FROM ai_scan_user U ORDER BY iStatusOrder, username ASC }
{SELECT COUNT(0) FROM ltblUsers U WHERE U.status = "ONLINE"}

{SELECT J.delivery_note_id delivery_note_id, J.delivery_note_work_start_date delivery_note_work_start_date, J.lang lang, CASE WHEN ((fNowHours*60)+fNowMinutes+(fNowSeconds/60)) < ((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))/60)) THEN ((((dtlNow-J.delivery_note_work_start_date)*24*60)+((fNowHours*60)+fNowMinutes+(fNowSeconds/60)))/60)+ABS((((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))/60))/60)-24) ELSE ((((dtlNow-J.delivery_note_work_start_date)*24*60)+((fNowHours*60)+fNowMinutes+(fNowSeconds/60)))/60)-(((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(J.delivery_note_work_start_date))/60))/60) END hours_time_calculator FROM ai_scan_jobs J WHERE J.status != "DONE" AND ( J.id NOT IN (SELECT J2.job_id_2 FROM ai_scan_jobs J2 WHERE J2.type = "QA") AND J.id NOT IN (SELECT J2.job_id_3 FROM ai_scan_jobs J2 WHERE J2.type = "QA") ) GROUP BY J.delivery_note_id }
{SELECT COUNT(NDN.delivery_note_id) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN}
{SELECT COUNT(NDN.delivery_note_id) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "hu_hu"}
{SELECT COUNT(NDN.delivery_note_id) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "eng_eng"}
{SELECT COUNT(NDN.delivery_note_id) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "pl_pl"}
{SELECT AVG(NDN.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN}
{SELECT AVG(NDN.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "hu_hu"}
{SELECT AVG(NDN.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "eng_eng"}
{SELECT AVG(NDN.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "pl_pl"}
{SELECT MAX(NDN.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN}
{SELECT MAX(NDN.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "hu_hu"}
{SELECT MAX(NDN.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "eng_eng"}
{SELECT MAX(NDN.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowDeliveryNote NDN WHERE NDN.lang = "pl_pl"}

{SELECT J.delivery_note_id delivery_note_id, J.create_date create_date, J.lang lang, J.type job_type, CASE WHEN ((fNowHours*60)+fNowMinutes+(fNowSeconds/60)) < ((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(J.create_date))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(J.create_date))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(J.create_date))/60)) THEN ((((dtlNow-J.create_date)*24*60)+((fNowHours*60)+fNowMinutes+(fNowSeconds/60)))/60)+ABS((((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(J.create_date))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(J.create_date))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(J.create_date))/60))/60)-24) ELSE ((((dtlNow-J.create_date)*24*60)+((fNowHours*60)+fNowMinutes+(fNowSeconds/60)))/60)-(((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(J.create_date))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(J.create_date))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(J.create_date))/60))/60) END hours_time_calculator FROM ai_scan_jobs J WHERE J.status = "UNCHECKED" AND ( J.id NOT IN (SELECT J2.job_id_2 FROM ai_scan_jobs J2 WHERE J2.type = "QA") AND J.id NOT IN (SELECT J2.job_id_3 FROM ai_scan_jobs J2 WHERE J2.type = "QA") ) AND ( J.job_id_2 IN (SELECT J2.id FROM ai_scan_jobs J2 WHERE J2.type = "ANOT") ) }

{SELECT COUNT(NANOTAQA.delivery_note_id) FROM ltblNowANOTAndQA NANOTAQA WHERE NANOTAQA.job_type = "QA" AND NANOTAQA.lang = "eng_eng"}
{SELECT COUNT(NANOTAQA.delivery_note_id) FROM ltblNowANOTAndQA NANOTAQA WHERE NANOTAQA.job_type = "QA" AND NANOTAQA.lang = "pl_pl"}

{SELECT AVG(NANOTAQA.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowANOTAndQA NANOTAQA WHERE NANOTAQA.job_type = "QA" AND NANOTAQA.lang = "eng_eng"}
{SELECT AVG(NANOTAQA.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowANOTAndQA NANOTAQA WHERE NANOTAQA.job_type = "QA" AND NANOTAQA.lang = "pl_pl"}

{SELECT MAX(NANOTAQA.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowANOTAndQA NANOTAQA WHERE NANOTAQA.job_type = "QA" AND NANOTAQA.lang = "eng_eng"}
{SELECT MAX(NANOTAQA.hours_time_calculator) FROM ltblNowANOTAndQA NANOTAQA WHERE NANOTAQA.job_type = "QA" AND NANOTAQA.lang = "pl_pl"}

{SELECT J.delivery_note_id delivery_note_id, J.delivery_note_work_time delivery_note_work_time, J.lang lang FROM ai_scan_jobs J WHERE J.status = "DONE" AND ( J.id NOT IN (SELECT J2.job_id_2 FROM ai_scan_jobs J2 WHERE J2.type = "QA") AND J.id NOT IN (SELECT J2.job_id_3 FROM ai_scan_jobs J2 WHERE J2.type = "QA") ) AND ( J.job_id_2 IN (SELECT J2.id FROM ai_scan_jobs J2 WHERE J2.type = "ANOT" AND J2.status = "DONE") ) AND CASE WHEN ddDateFilter.selectedKey = 1 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) = STARTOFDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen) WHEN ddDateFilter.selectedKey = 2 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) = STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,-1)) WHEN ddDateFilter.selectedKey = 3 THEN CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(sysp.dtlFormOpen) = 0 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) >= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,-6)) AND STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) <= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,0)) WHEN DAYOFWEEK(sysp.dtlFormOpen) = 1 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) >= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,0)) AND STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) <= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,6)) WHEN DAYOFWEEK(sysp.dtlFormOpen) = 2 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) >= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,-1)) AND STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) <= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,5)) WHEN DAYOFWEEK(sysp.dtlFormOpen) = 3 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) >= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,-2)) AND STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) <= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,4)) WHEN DAYOFWEEK(sysp.dtlFormOpen) = 4 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) >= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,-3)) AND STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) <= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,3)) WHEN DAYOFWEEK(sysp.dtlFormOpen) = 5 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) >= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,-4)) AND STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) <= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,2)) ELSE STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) >= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,-5)) AND STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) <= STARTOFDAY(ADDDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen,1)) END WHEN ddDateFilter.selectedKey = 4 THEN STARTOFMONTH(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) = STARTOFMONTH(sysp.dtlFormOpen) WHEN ddDateFilter.selectedKey = 5 THEN STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) >= STARTOFDAY(dpFromDate.date) AND STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) <= STARTOFDAY(dpToDate.date) ELSE STARTOFDAY(J.delivery_note_work_end_date) = STARTOFDAY(sysp.dtlFormOpen) END GROUP BY J.delivery_note_id }

let.value: {SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) != 0 THEN JI.job_start_time ELSE NULL END FROM ai_scan_job_inprogress JI LEFT JOIN ai_scan_jobs J ON J.id = JI.job_id WHERE JI.user_id = stUserId AND J.type = "ANOT"}

{CASE WHEN ((fDtlNowHours*60)+fDtlNowMinutes+(fDtlNowSeconds/60)) < ((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))/60)) THEN (((((dtlNow-dtlUserCurrentJobTime)*24*60)+((fDtlNowHours*60)+fDtlNowMinutes+(fDtlNowSeconds/60)))/60)+ABS((((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))/60))/60)-24))*60 ELSE (((((dtlNow-dtlUserCurrentJobTime)*24*60)+((fDtlNowHours*60)+fDtlNowMinutes+(fDtlNowSeconds/60)))/60)-(((TOFLOAT(GETHOUR(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))*60)+TOFLOAT(GETMINUTE(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))+(TOFLOAT(GETSECOND(dtlUserCurrentJobTime))/60))/60))*60 END}
